title: Too many warnings on MSVC 2017
body:
I'm getting the following warnings:

```
Severity	Code	Description	Project	File	Line
Warning	C4244	'argument': conversion from 'wchar_t' to 'char', possible loss of data	MSRServiceInterface	E:\code\frontend\source\Core\ThirdParty\fmt\include\fmt\format.h	1464
Warning	C4244	'argument': conversion from 'wchar_t' to 'char', possible loss of data	MSRServiceInterface	E:\code\frontend\source\Core\ThirdParty\fmt\include\fmt\format.h	1455
Warning	C4244	'argument': conversion from 'wchar_t' to 'char', possible loss of data	MSRServiceInterface	E:\code\frontend\source\Core\ThirdParty\fmt\include\fmt\format.h	2468
Warning	C4244	'argument': conversion from 'wchar_t' to 'char', possible loss of data	MSRServiceInterface	E:\code\frontend\source\Core\ThirdParty\fmt\include\fmt\format.h	2701
Warning	C4244	'=': conversion from 'wchar_t' to 'char', possible loss of data	MSRServiceInterface	E:\code\frontend\source\Core\ThirdParty\fmt\include\fmt\format.h	2418
Warning	C4244	'=': conversion from 'wchar_t' to 'char', possible loss of data	MSRServiceInterface	E:\code\frontend\source\Core\ThirdParty\fmt\include\fmt\format.h	2397
Warning	C4244	'return': conversion from 'int64_t' to 'unsigned int', possible loss of data	MSRServiceInterface	e:\code\frontend\source\core\thirdparty\fmt\include\fmt\core.h	1067
Warning	C4244	'=': conversion from 'const wchar_t' to 'char', possible loss of data	MSRServiceInterface	E:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Professional\VC\Tools\MSVC\14.12.25827\include\xutility	2933
```

I have warnings treated as errors in my code base, and I can't even use this library because of the warnings. I'm running latest on `master` at the moment. Am I missing something here?
